name.en: Super Galaxy King Lord of Galactica [L]
name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>銀<rt>ぎん</rt></ruby><ruby>河<rt>が</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>ロード・オブ・ギャラクティカ［<ruby>Ｌ<rt>エル</rt></ruby>］

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: 1 face-up Galaxy/Spellcaster/Machine/Dragon Type monster with 4000 or more ATK and 4000 or more original ATK on your field loses 4000 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, you can destroy up to 4 cards on your opponent's field.
